ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 pound) whole pompano fish, gutted and cleaned
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Oil the grill grates generously or use a grill basket to prevent fish from sticking
Stuff fish cavity with lime slices and herbs for added flavor and moisture
Grill whole fish for 8-10 minutes per side depending on size until flesh flakes easily
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Grilling whole fish can seem intimidating but creates beautiful presentation. Would you like step-by-step guidance?
